author: cnbc.com
title: TPG RE Finance Trust, Inc. to Present at the Citi 2018 Global Property CEO Conference
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- TPG RE Finance Trust, Inc. (NYSE: TRTX) (the “Company”) today announced that Greta Guggenheim, Chief Executive Officer, will speak on the Mortgage REIT Panel at the Citi 2018 Global Property CEO Conference on Tuesday, March 6, 2018 at 10:55 AM ET.
A live audio webcast of the presentation will be available on the Investor Relations section of TRTX’s website at http://investors.tpgrefinance.com/event . For those unable to listen to the live audio webcast, a replay will be available on the website shortly after the event.
In conjunction with the conference, the Company will post an updated presentation to the investor relations section of its website at www.tpgrefinance.com .
ABOUT TRTX
TPG RE Finance Trust, Inc. is a commercial real estate finance company that focuses primarily on originating, acquiring, and managing first mortgage loans and other commercial real estate‐related debt instruments secured by high quality institutional properties located in primary and select secondary markets in the United States. The Company is externally managed by TPG RE Finance Trust Management, L.P., a part of TPG Real Estate, which is the real estate investment platform of TPG Global, LLC (“TPG”). TPG is a leading global alternative investment firm with a 25-year history and approximately $79 billion of assets under management. For more information regarding TRTX, visit www.tpgrefinance.com .
